);
mapper.select: SELECT um.provider, fm.forums_id, fm.user_id, fm.topic, fm.content, fm.good_count, fm.bad_count, fm.create_date FROM forums_mst fm LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.id = fm.user_id) WHERE end_date >= CURDATE();

SELECT um.provider, fm.forums_id, fm.user_id, fm.topic, fm.content, fm.good_count, fm.bad_count, fm.create_date, fm.reply_count FROM forums_mst fm LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.id = fm.user_id) WHERE fm.create_date BETWEEN '2021-12-20' AND '2021-12-26' ORDER BY fm.good_count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT um.provider, fm.forums_id, fm.user_id, fm.topic, fm.content, fm.good_count, fm.bad_count, fm.create_date, fm.reply_count FROM forums_mst fm LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.id = fm.user_id) ORDER BY fm.reply_count DESC LIMIT 5;
